patch:
@@ -1,8 +1,19 @@
-.classpath
+target
+
+# Eclipse, IntelliJ, NetBeans and Visual Studio Code files
 .project
+.classpath
 .settings
-target
 .idea
-*.iml
+.vscode
 *.ipr
 *.iws
+*.iml
+nbproject
+.factorypath
+
+# Mac DS_Store files
+.DS_Store
+
+# Temporary files created by Surefire in Windows
+TempWmicBatchFile.bat

@@ -20,5 +20,8 @@ jdk:
   - openjdk11
   - openjdk-ea
 
+script:
+  - ./mvnw clean verify
+
 after_success:
   - mvn clean cobertura:cobertura coveralls:report

@@ -0,0 +1,159 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests-jakarta-ee</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE :: Jakarta EE tests</name>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <type>war</type>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+      <type>war</type>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <type>ear</type>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+      <type>ear</type>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+
+  <profiles>
+    <profile>
+      <id>run-integration-tests</id>
+      <activation>
+        <!-- TomEE 9.x only works with Java versions up to Java 11 (from the LTS releases) -->
+        <jdk>(,12)</jdk>
+        <property>
+          <name>skipTests</name>
+          <value>!true</value>
+        </property>
+      </activation>
+      <build>
+        <plugins>
+          <plugin>
+            <groupId>org.codehaus.cargo</groupId>
+            <artifactId>cargo-maven3-plugin</artifactId>
+            <configuration>
+              <container>
+                <containerId>tomee9x</containerId>
+                <artifactInstaller>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomee.jakarta</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>apache-tomee</artifactId>
+                  <classifier>plus</classifier>
+                  <version>9.0.0-M3</version>
+                </artifactInstaller>
+              </container>
+              <configuration>
+                <home>${project.build.directory}/tomee-home</home>
+                <properties>
+                  <cargo.servlet.port>${jakartaee.itests.servlet.port}</cargo.servlet.port>
+                  <cargo.rmi.port>${jakartaee.itests.rmi.port}</cargo.rmi.port>
+                </properties>
+              </configuration>
+              <deployables>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+                  <type>war</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <context>java-ee-webapp</context>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+                  <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+                  <type>war</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <context>jakarta-ee-webapp</context>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+                  <type>ear</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <name>java-ee-ear</name>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+                  <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+                  <type>ear</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <name>jakarta-ee-ear</name>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+              </deployables>
+            </configuration>
+            <executions>
+              <execution>
+                <id>start</id>
+                <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>start</goal>
+                </goals>
+              </execution>
+              <execution>
+                <id>stop</id>
+                <phase>post-integration-test</phase>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>stop</goal>
+                </goals>
+              </execution>
+            </executions>
+          </plugin>
+        </plugins>
+      </build>
+    </profile>
+  </profiles>
+
+  <build>
+    <plugins>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-failsafe-plugin</artifactId>
+        <configuration>
+          <skip>true</skip>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>
+    </plugins>
+  </build>
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,159 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests-java-ee</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE :: Java EE tests</name>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <type>war</type>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+      <type>war</type>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <type>ear</type>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+      <type>ear</type>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+
+  <profiles>
+    <profile>
+      <id>run-integration-tests</id>
+      <activation>
+        <!-- TomEE 8.x only works with Java versions up to Java 11 (from the LTS releases) -->
+        <jdk>(,12)</jdk>
+        <property>
+          <name>skipTests</name>
+          <value>!true</value>
+        </property>
+      </activation>
+      <build>
+        <plugins>
+          <plugin>
+            <groupId>org.codehaus.cargo</groupId>
+            <artifactId>cargo-maven3-plugin</artifactId>
+            <configuration>
+              <container>
+                <containerId>tomee8x</containerId>
+                <artifactInstaller>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomee</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>apache-tomee</artifactId>
+                  <classifier>plus</classifier>
+                  <version>8.0.6</version>
+                </artifactInstaller>
+              </container>
+              <configuration>
+                <home>${project.build.directory}/tomee-home</home>
+                <properties>
+                  <cargo.servlet.port>${jakartaee.itests.servlet.port}</cargo.servlet.port>
+                  <cargo.rmi.port>${jakartaee.itests.rmi.port}</cargo.rmi.port>
+                </properties>
+              </configuration>
+              <deployables>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+                  <type>war</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <context>java-ee-webapp</context>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+                  <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+                  <type>war</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <context>jakarta-ee-webapp</context>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+                  <type>ear</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <name>java-ee-ear</name>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+                <deployable>
+                  <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+                  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+                  <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+                  <type>ear</type>
+                  <properties>
+                    <name>jakarta-ee-ear</name>
+                  </properties>
+                </deployable>
+              </deployables>
+            </configuration>
+            <executions>
+              <execution>
+                <id>start</id>
+                <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>start</goal>
+                </goals>
+              </execution>
+              <execution>
+                <id>stop</id>
+                <phase>post-integration-test</phase>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>stop</goal>
+                </goals>
+              </execution>
+            </executions>
+          </plugin>
+        </plugins>
+      </build>
+    </profile>
+  </profiles>
+
+  <build>
+    <plugins>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-failsafe-plugin</artifactId>
+        <configuration>
+          <skip>true</skip>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>
+    </plugins>
+  </build>
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,99 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-parent</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE :: Integration tests</name>
+  <packaging>pom</packaging>
+
+  <modules>
+    <module>test-webapp</module>
+    <module>test-ear</module>
+    <module>itest-java-ee</module>
+    <module>itest-jakarta-ee</module>
+  </modules>
+
+  <profiles>
+    <profile>
+      <id>run-integration-tests</id>
+      <activation>
+        <property>
+          <name>skipTests</name>
+          <value>!true</value>
+        </property>
+      </activation>
+      <build>
+        <plugins>
+          <plugin>
+            <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
+            <artifactId>build-helper-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+            <executions>
+              <execution>
+                <id>generate-port-numbers</id>
+                <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>reserve-network-port</goal>
+                </goals>
+                <configuration>
+                  <portNames>
+                    <portName>jakartaee.itests.servlet.port</portName>
+                    <portName>jakartaee.itests.rmi.port</portName>
+                    <portName>jakartaee.itests.tomcat.ajp.port</portName>
+                  </portNames>
+                </configuration>
+              </execution>
+            </executions>
+          </plugin>
+          <plugin>
+            <artifactId>maven-failsafe-plugin</artifactId>
+            <executions>
+              <execution>
+                <id>perform-integration-tests</id>
+                <phase>integration-test</phase>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>integration-test</goal>
+                </goals>
+                <configuration>
+                  <systemProperties>
+                    <property>
+                      <name>servlet.port</name>
+                      <value>${jakartaee.itests.servlet.port}</value>
+                    </property>
+                  </systemProperties>
+                </configuration>
+              </execution>
+              <execution>
+                <id>verify-integration-tests</id>
+                <goals>
+                  <goal>verify</goal>
+                </goals>
+              </execution>
+            </executions>
+          </plugin>
+        </plugins>
+      </build>
+    </profile>
+  </profiles>
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--

+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-parent</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE :: Test EAR (parent POM)</name>
+  <packaging>pom</packaging>
+
+  <modules>
+    <module>test-ejb-api</module>
+    <module>test-ejb-impl</module>
+    <module>test-ejb-webapp</module>
+    <module>test-ear</module>
+  </modules>
+
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,166 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-parent</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE :: Test EAR</name>
+  <packaging>ear</packaging>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-ejb-api</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-ejb-impl</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-webapp</artifactId>
+      <type>war</type>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+    </dependency>
+
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <scope>test</scope>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+
+  <build>
+    <plugins>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-ear-plugin</artifactId>
+        <configuration>
+          <modules>
+            <jarModule>
+              <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+              <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-ejb-api</artifactId>
+              <bundleDir>lib</bundleDir>
+            </jarModule>
+            <jarModule>
+              <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+              <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-ejb-impl</artifactId>
+            </jarModule>
+            <webModule>
+              <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+              <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-ear-webapp</artifactId>
+              <contextRoot>/test-ear-javaee</contextRoot>
+            </webModule>
+          </modules>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
+        <artifactId>exec-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>update-jakarta-ee-ejb</id>
+            <phase>verify</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>java</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <mainClass>org.apache.tomcat.jakartaee.MigrationCLI</mainClass>
+              <arguments>
+                <argument>-profile=EE</argument>
+                <argument>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-${project.version}/org.apache.tomcat-jakartaee-migration-test-ear-ejb-impl-${project.version}.jar</argument>
+                <argument>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-jakarta-ee/org.apache.tomcat-jakartaee-migration-test-ear-ejb-impl-${project.version}.jar</argument>
+              </arguments>
+              <classpathScope>test</classpathScope>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+          <execution>
+            <id>update-jakarta-ee-war</id>
+            <phase>verify</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>java</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <mainClass>org.apache.tomcat.jakartaee.MigrationCLI</mainClass>
+              <arguments>
+                <argument>-profile=EE</argument>
+                <argument>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-${project.version}/org.apache.tomcat-jakartaee-migration-test-ear-webapp-${project.version}.war</argument>
+                <argument>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-jakarta-ee/org.apache.tomcat-jakartaee-migration-test-ear-webapp-${project.version}.war</argument>
+              </arguments>
+              <classpathScope>test</classpathScope>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>update-jakarta-ee-ear</id>
+            <phase>verify</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>run</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <target>
+                <replace file="${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-${project.version}/META-INF/application.xml">
+                  <replacetoken>/test-ear-javaee</replacetoken>
+                  <replacevalue>/test-ear-jakartaee</replacevalue>
+                </replace>
+                <copy file="${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-${project.version}.ear" tofile="${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-jakarta-ee.ear"/>
+                <zip destfile="${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-jakarta-ee.ear" update="true">
+                  <fileset dir="${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-${project.version}" includes="META-INF/application.xml"/>
+                  <fileset dir="${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-jakarta-ee" includes="**/*.*"/>
+                </zip>
+              </target>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
+        <artifactId>build-helper-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>attach-jakarta-ee-ear</id>
+            <phase>verify</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>attach-artifact</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <artifacts>
+                <artifact>
+                  <file>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-ear-jakarta-ee.ear</file>
+                  <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+                  <type>ear</type>
+                </artifact>
+              </artifacts>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+    </plugins>
+  </build>
+
+</project>

See the NOTICE file distributed with + * this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership. + * The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0 + * (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with + * the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at + * + * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 + * + * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software + * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, + * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. + * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and + * limitations under the License. + */ +package org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.ejb.api; + +/** + * API for the sample EJB.

+ * Due to the way Tomcat is designed, if you have a JEE class under a (sub)package of + * org.apache.tomcat.** then Tomcat will "filter it out" - As it believes you are + * trying to access its own internal classes. We hence need to put our integration test classes + * under the org.apache.jakartaee.testdata package. + */ +public interface SampleEjbApi { + public String sayHello(); +}

See the NOTICE file distributed with + * this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership. + * The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0 + * (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with + * the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at + * + * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 + * + * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software + * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, + * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. + * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and + * limitations under the License. + */ +package org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.ejb.impl; + +import javax.ejb.Local; +import javax.ejb.Remote; +import javax.ejb.Stateless; + +import org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.ejb.api.SampleEjbApi; + +/** + * Implementation of the sample EJB.

+ * Due to the way Tomcat is designed, if you have a JEE class under a (sub)package of + * org.apache.tomcat.** then Tomcat will "filter it out" - As it believes you are + * trying to access its own internal classes. We hence need to put our integration test classes + * under the org.apache.jakartaee.testdata package. + */ +@Local +@Remote +@Stateless +public class SampleEjb implements SampleEjbApi { + @Override + public String sayHello() { + return "Hello, World!"; + } +}

See the NOTICE file distributed with + * this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership. + * The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0 + * (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with + * the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at + * + * http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0 + * + * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software + * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, + * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. + * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and + * limitations under the License. + */ +package org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.ejb.impl; + +import org.junit.Assert; +import org.junit.Test; + +import org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.ejb.api.SampleEjbApi; + +/** + * Test the mmplementation of the sample EJB.

+ * Due to the way Tomcat is designed, if you have a JEE class under a (sub)package of + * org.apache.tomcat.** then Tomcat will "filter it out" - As it believes you are + * trying to access its own internal classes. We hence need to put our integration test classes + * under the org.apache.jakartaee.testdata package. + */ +public class SampleEjbTest { + @Test + public void testSampleEjb() { + SampleEjbApi sampleEjb = new SampleEjb(); + Assert.assertEquals("Hello, World!", sampleEjb.sayHello()); + } +}

@@ -0,0 +1,106 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-itests</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-test-webapp</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE :: Test Webapp</name>
+  <packaging>war</packaging>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>javax.servlet</groupId>
+      <artifactId>javax.servlet-api</artifactId>
+      <version>3.0.1</version>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.geronimo.specs</groupId>
+      <artifactId>geronimo-jms_1.1_spec</artifactId>
+      <version>1.1.1</version>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>javax.mail</groupId>
+      <artifactId>mail</artifactId>
+      <version>1.4</version>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+      <artifactId>jakartaee-migration</artifactId>
+      <version>${project.version}</version>
+      <scope>test</scope>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+
+  <build>
+    <plugins>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
+        <artifactId>exec-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>create-jakarta-ee-war</id>
+            <phase>verify</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>java</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <mainClass>org.apache.tomcat.jakartaee.MigrationCLI</mainClass>
+              <arguments>
+                <argument>-profile=EE</argument>
+                <argument>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-webapp-${project.version}.war</argument>
+                <argument>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-webapp-jakarta-ee.war</argument>
+              </arguments>
+              <classpathScope>test</classpathScope>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
+        <artifactId>build-helper-maven-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>attach-jakarta-ee-war</id>
+            <phase>verify</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>attach-artifact</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <artifacts>
+                <artifact>
+                  <file>${project.build.directory}/jakartaee-migration-test-webapp-jakarta-ee.war</file>
+                  <classifier>jakarta-ee</classifier>
+                  <type>war</type>
+                </artifact>
+              </artifacts>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+    </plugins>
+  </build>
+
+</project>

@@ -0,0 +1,90 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<web-app xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee/web-app_3_0.xsd"
+         version="3.0">
+
+  <description>Webapp for testing</description>
+
+  <servlet>
+    <servlet-name>test-datasource-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <servlet-class>org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.datasource.DataSourceServlet</servlet-class>
+  </servlet>
+
+  <servlet-mapping>
+    <servlet-name>test-datasource-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <url-pattern>/test-datasource</url-pattern>
+  </servlet-mapping>
+
+  <resource-ref>
+    <description>The test datasource</description>
+    <res-ref-name>jdbc/TestDS</res-ref-name>
+    <res-type>javax.sql.DataSource</res-type>
+    <res-auth>Container</res-auth>
+  </resource-ref>
+
+  <servlet>
+    <servlet-name>test-jms-queue-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <servlet-class>org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.jms.JmsQueueServlet</servlet-class>
+  </servlet>
+
+  <servlet-mapping>
+    <servlet-name>test-jms-queue-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <url-pattern>/test-jms-queue</url-pattern>
+  </servlet-mapping>
+
+  <resource-ref>
+    <description>The test JMS queue</description>
+    <res-ref-name>jms/MyQueue</res-ref-name>
+    <res-type>javax.jms.Queue</res-type>
+    <res-auth>Container</res-auth>
+  </resource-ref>
+
+  <servlet>
+    <servlet-name>test-jms-topic-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <servlet-class>org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.jms.JmsTopicServlet</servlet-class>
+  </servlet>
+
+  <servlet-mapping>
+    <servlet-name>test-jms-topic-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <url-pattern>/test-jms-topic</url-pattern>
+  </servlet-mapping>
+
+  <resource-ref>
+    <description>The test JMS Topic</description>
+    <res-ref-name>jms/MyTopic</res-ref-name>
+    <res-type>javax.jms.Topic</res-type>
+    <res-auth>Container</res-auth>
+  </resource-ref>
+
+  <servlet>
+    <servlet-name>test-mailsession-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <servlet-class>org.apache.jakartaee.testdata.mail.MailSessionServlet</servlet-class>
+  </servlet>
+
+  <servlet-mapping>
+    <servlet-name>test-mailsession-servlet</servlet-name>
+    <url-pattern>/test-mailsession</url-pattern>
+  </servlet-mapping>
+
+  <resource-ref>
+    <description>The test Mail session</description>
+    <res-ref-name>mail/Session</res-ref-name>
+    <res-type>javax.mail.Session</res-type>
+    <res-auth>Container</res-auth>
+  </resource-ref>
+</web-app>

@@ -0,0 +1,197 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!--
+  Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one or more
+  contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file distributed with
+  this work for additional information regarding copyright ownership.
+  The ASF licenses this file to You under the Apache License, Version 2.0
+  (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with
+  the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+
+      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+
+  Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+  distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+  WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+  See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+  limitations under the License.
+-->
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+ 
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.apache.tomcat</groupId>
+    <artifactId>jakartaee-migration-parent</artifactId>
+    <version>0.2.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>jakartaee-migration</artifactId>
+  <name>Apache Tomcat Migration Tool for Jakarta EE</name>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.bcel</groupId>
+      <artifactId>bcel</artifactId>
+      <version>6.5.0</version>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
+      <artifactId>commons-compress</artifactId>
+      <version>1.20</version>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>commons-io</groupId>
+      <artifactId>commons-io</artifactId>
+      <version>2.8.0</version>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.apache.ant</groupId>
+      <artifactId>ant</artifactId>
+      <version>1.10.9</version>
+      <scope>provided</scope>
+    </dependency>
+  </dependencies>
+
+  <build>
+    <resources>
+      <resource>
+        <directory>src/main/resources</directory>
+        <filtering>true</filtering>
+      </resource>
+    </resources>
+
+    <plugins>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-antrun-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>create-test-jars</id>
+            <phase>process-test-classes</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>run</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <target>
+                <jar destfile="target/test-classes/cgi-api.jar" basedir="target/test-classes" includes="**/CommonGatewayInterface*" />
+                <jar destfile="target/test-classes/hellocgi.jar" basedir="target/test-classes" includes="**/HelloCGI*">
+                  <manifest>
+                    <attribute name="Implementation-Version" value="1.2.3" />
+                  </manifest>
+                </jar>
+
+                <!-- Generate the signed jar files -->
+                <!--
+                  The keystore contains 3 keys (RSA, DSA and EC) and was generated with Java 12:
+                    keytool -genkey -validity 3650 -keystore keystore.p12 -storetype pkcs12 -dname CN=Test -alias rsa -keyalg RSA -keysize 1024
+                    keytool -genkey -validity 3650 -keystore keystore.p12 -storetype pkcs12 -dname CN=Test -alias dsa -keyalg DSA -keysize 1024
+                    keytool -genkey -validity 3650 -keystore keystore.p12 -storetype pkcs12 -dname CN=Test -alias ec  -keyalg EC  -groupname secp384r1
+                -->
+                <parallel>
+                  <sequential>
+                    <copy file="target/test-classes/hellocgi.jar" tofile="target/test-classes/hellocgi-signed-rsa.jar" />
+                    <signjar jar="target/test-classes/hellocgi-signed-rsa.jar" keystore="src/test/resources/keystore.p12" storepass="apache" alias="rsa" />
+                  </sequential>
+                  <sequential>
+                    <copy file="target/test-classes/hellocgi.jar" tofile="target/test-classes/hellocgi-signed-dsa.jar" />
+                    <signjar jar="target/test-classes/hellocgi-signed-dsa.jar" keystore="src/test/resources/keystore.p12" storepass="apache" alias="dsa" />
+                  </sequential>
+                  <sequential>
+                    <copy file="target/test-classes/hellocgi.jar" tofile="target/test-classes/hellocgi-signed-ec.jar" />
+                    <signjar jar="target/test-classes/hellocgi-signed-ec.jar" keystore="src/test/resources/keystore.p12" storepass="apache" alias="ec" />
+                  </sequential>
+                </parallel>
+              </target>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
+        <configuration>
+          <reuseForks>false</reuseForks>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
+        <configuration>
+          <archive>
+            <manifest>
+              <addClasspath>true</addClasspath>
+              <mainClass>org.apache.tomcat.jakartaee.MigrationCLI</mainClass>
+            </manifest>
+          </archive>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-assembly-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <id>make-assembly</id>
+            <phase>package</phase>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>single</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <descriptors>
+                <descriptor>src/assembly/bin.xml</descriptor>
+                <descriptor>src/assembly/src.xml</descriptor>
+              </descriptors>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+      <plugin>
+        <artifactId>maven-shade-plugin</artifactId>
+        <executions>
+          <execution>
+            <goals>
+              <goal>shade</goal>
+            </goals>
+            <configuration>
+              <shadedArtifactAttached>true</shadedArtifactAttached>
+              <minimizeJar>true</minimizeJar>
+              <createDependencyReducedPom>false</createDependencyReducedPom>
+              <filters>
+                <filter>
+                  <artifact>org.apache.bcel:*</artifact>
+                  <excludes>
+                    <exclude>META-INF/**</exclude>
+                  </excludes>
+                </filter>
+                <filter>
+                  <artifact>org.apache.commons:*</artifact>
+                  <excludes>
+                    <exclude>META-INF/**</exclude>
+                  </excludes>
+                </filter>
+                <filter>
+                  <artifact>commons-io:*</artifact>
+                  <excludes>
+                    <exclude>META-INF/**</exclude>
+                  </excludes>
+                </filter>
+              </filters>
+              <relocations>
+                <relocation>
+                  <pattern>org.apache.commons</pattern>
+                  <shadedPattern>org.apache.tomcat.jakartaee.commons</shadedPattern>
+                </relocation>
+                <relocation>
+                  <pattern>org.apache.bcel</pattern>
+                  <shadedPattern>org.apache.tomcat.jakartaee.bcel</shadedPattern>
+                </relocation>
+              </relocations>
+              <transformers>
+                <transformer implementation="org.apache.maven.plugins.shade.resource.ManifestResourceTransformer">
+                  <manifestEntries>
+                    <Class-Path/>
+                  </manifestEntries>
+                </transformer>
+              </transformers>
+            </configuration>
+          </execution>
+        </executions>
+      </plugin>
+    </plugins>
+  </build>
+
+</project>
